.. This is a practice on how to create subpage and use hyperlink in Sphnix
   to add a hyperlink, add .. -xx (make sure to be consistent in the whole file)
   to the target and :ref: in the original file
.. _settingup:

Steps for Sphinx onboarding
===========================

This is the section under subtile 1

1. Install Sphnix by following steps on this page: https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/installation.html
2. Go to Title 2
